(Name of the place is up to you)"},{"lineNumber":251271,"originalJapaneseLine":"この場所が南西部の１番の激戦区であり、ゼス炎軍、氷軍を中心とした軍団と","translatedEnglishLine":"This area is the fiercest battlefield in the southwest, with the Zeth Flame Army and Ice Army as the main forces,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と喧嘩になってしまうかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might end up fighting with Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くくくく、それはいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒った親父をたたき伏せて、動けなくなった所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knock down the angry old man and, when he's immobilized,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘を犯す姿を見せつけてやろう、こういうのもエロマンガにあったぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: make him watch as I violate his daughter—I've seen this in erotic manga too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　て、冗談だ、一人であってこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hey, just kidding, go meet her alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　自分で会いにいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > I'll go see her myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがとうございます、ランス様とシィルは家に向かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you very much. Lord Rance and Sheila headed toward the house.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残ったランスに　かなみが話しかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami spoke to Rance, who stayed behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい所あるじゃない。とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a nice place, isn't there? Or something like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、十分　あいつがひびって怖がる姿を堪能したしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I thoroughly enjoyed seeing that guy get shaken and scared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、俺はそこまで暇じゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I'm not that free.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな訳でかなみー、ちょうどいい、パンツ脱げー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So Kanami—perfect timing, take off your panties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・こんな所でー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh... here of all places—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくしたらシィルが戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a while, Sheila returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し涙目、ちゃんと親には会えたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With slightly teary eyes, did she properly meet her parents?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、とにっこり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, and smiled brightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、次へ行くぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's move on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがシィルをひっぱって進む・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance pulled Sheila along and moved forward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、シィルじゃないかと男と女が現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A man and a woman appeared, saying, "Sheila, isn't that you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだと思っていたが無事でよかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We thought you were dead, but we're glad you're safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなに立派になって、その人はとランスに気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've become so fine—then they noticed Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうかお前の旦那か、結婚したんだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, so this is your husband. You've gotten married.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい人そうじゃないか、うちの娘がお世話になっていますと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems like a good person; thank you for taking care of our daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親とも非常に低姿勢で丁寧、ランスはちゃかす機会を完全に失う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both parents were very humble and polite; Rance completely lost his chance to tease them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは自分の親の記憶がなく、親の存在は始めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had no memories of his own parents and this was his first time meeting them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘の婿は私の息子同然だと、無条件で歓待してくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They welcomed him unconditionally, saying their daughter's husband was like their own son.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもちょっとうれしくなる、シィルの事は俺に任せておけと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance felt somewhat happy and said to leave Sheila's matters to him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親は絵は出さないようにして下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please do not depict the parents in images.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーの想像にまかせる存在でいきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will leave their appearance to the user's imagination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中ネタとして・・　父親・・アフロじゃないのか？とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a joke... is the father an afro? Or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親、けっこう美人じゃないか、がんばれば親子丼もいけるか、いやさすがに無理だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mother is quite a beauty; if I tried hard, maybe an incest scene could work, though that's probably impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し早く来るんだったとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I should have come a bit earlier or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 孫が出来たら、また来てくれよーという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They said, "Come again when you have grandchildren!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家を出る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They left the house.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ありがとうございます。私の両親を安心させる為にその・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, thank you. To put my parents at ease, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私と夫婦みたいな話に会わせてもらって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you for letting them think we are like a married couple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、ま感謝しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, well, be grateful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなかいい両親だな、そっか・・あれが親か・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are pretty good parents. I see... so those are parents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、ランス様も本当の両親ように思って頂いても、にっこり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, Lord Rance, please think of them as your real parents too, she said with a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽかり、調子に乗るな。くそっ、タイミング逸して奴隷を両親の前で辱める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Smack! Don't get cocky. Damn, I missed the timing to humiliate the slave in front of the parents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊びが出来なかったではないが、まぁ次の機会だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wasn't able to play around but, well, next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが魔法使いの杖を持っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila is holding a wizard's staff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、お前そんな杖もっていたか？いつのと違わないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, did you have such a staff? Isn't it different from before?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親から貰った杖、シィルを大切にしてくれていたおじいさんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a staff given by her parents, from her grandfather who treasured Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが二十歳になったら渡してくれと両親に渡していた物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had given it to the parents, asking them to hand it over when Sheila turned twenty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おじいさんの形見である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a memento from her grandfather.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前のおじいさん偉大な魔法使いだったそうだから、すごいのかその杖
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say your grandfather was a great wizard, so is that staff amazing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・偉大といっても、辺境の村での事なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Great or not, it was in a remote village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と一緒に世界のいろいろな場所にいく、すごい冒険をして、すごい人達と出会い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together with Lord Rance, she traveled to many places in the world, having incredible adventures and meeting amazing people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして今も世界最高ランクの装備品を頂いています、それに比べたら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, she has the world's top-ranking equipment; compared to that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中級よりちょっと上くらいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just a little above intermediate rank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、これおじさいんの宝でおじいさんにとってすごい魔法の杖で、私に譲ってくれたんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this is my grandfather's treasure; it's a great magic staff to him, and he passed it down to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、私・・いつもの杖でなくこちらを使うとちょっ力が発揮出来にくくなりますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, if I use this instead of my usual staff, my power is a bit harder to manifest...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持っていてもよいでしょうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it alright if I keep using this one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・好きにしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Do as you like.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、ＸＸＸ草原についた。（場所名は任せる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and company arrived at the XXX plains. (Name of the place is up to you)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この場所が南西部の１番の激戦区であり、ゼス炎軍、氷軍を中心とした軍団と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is the fiercest battlefield in the southwest, with the Zeth Flame Army and Ice Army as the main forces,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と喧嘩になってしまうかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might end up fighting with Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くくくく、それはいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒った親父をたたき伏せて、動けなくなった所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knock down the angry old man and, when he's immobilized,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘を犯す姿を見せつけてやろう、こういうのもエロマンガにあったぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: make him watch as I violate his daughter—I've seen this in erotic manga too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　て、冗談だ、一人であってこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hey, just kidding, go meet her alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　自分で会いにいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > I'll go see her myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがとうございます、ランス様とシィルは家に向かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you very much. Lord Rance and Sheila headed toward the house.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残ったランスに　かなみが話しかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami spoke to Rance, who stayed behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい所あるじゃない。とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a nice place, isn't there? Or something like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、十分　あいつがひびって怖がる姿を堪能したしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I thoroughly enjoyed seeing that guy get shaken and scared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、俺はそこまで暇じゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I'm not that free.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな訳でかなみー、ちょうどいい、パンツ脱げー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So Kanami—perfect timing, take off your panties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・こんな所でー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh... here of all places—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくしたらシィルが戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a while, Sheila returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し涙目、ちゃんと親には会えたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With slightly teary eyes, did she properly meet her parents?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、とにっこり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, and smiled brightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、次へ行くぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's move on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがシィルをひっぱって進む・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance pulled Sheila along and moved forward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、シィルじゃないかと男と女が現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A man and a woman appeared, saying, "Sheila, isn't that you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだと思っていたが無事でよかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We thought you were dead, but we're glad you're safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなに立派になって、その人はとランスに気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've become so fine—then they noticed Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうかお前の旦那か、結婚したんだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, so this is your husband. You've gotten married.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい人そうじゃないか、うちの娘がお世話になっていますと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems like a good person; thank you for taking care of our daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親とも非常に低姿勢で丁寧、ランスはちゃかす機会を完全に失う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both parents were very humble and polite; Rance completely lost his chance to tease them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは自分の親の記憶がなく、親の存在は始めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had no memories of his own parents and this was his first time meeting them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘の婿は私の息子同然だと、無条件で歓待してくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They welcomed him unconditionally, saying their daughter's husband was like their own son.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもちょっとうれしくなる、シィルの事は俺に任せておけと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance felt somewhat happy and said to leave Sheila's matters to him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親は絵は出さないようにして下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please do not depict the parents in images.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーの想像にまかせる存在でいきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will leave their appearance to the user's imagination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中ネタとして・・　父親・・アフロじゃないのか？とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a joke... is the father an afro? Or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親、けっこう美人じゃないか、がんばれば親子丼もいけるか、いやさすがに無理だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mother is quite a beauty; if I tried hard, maybe an incest scene could work, though that's probably impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し早く来るんだったとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I should have come a bit earlier or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 孫が出来たら、また来てくれよーという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They said, "Come again when you have grandchildren!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家を出る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They left the house.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ありがとうございます。私の両親を安心させる為にその・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, thank you. To put my parents at ease, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私と夫婦みたいな話に会わせてもらって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you for letting them think we are like a married couple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、ま感謝しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, well, be grateful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなかいい両親だな、そっか・・あれが親か・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are pretty good parents. I see... so those are parents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、ランス様も本当の両親ように思って頂いても、にっこり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, Lord Rance, please think of them as your real parents too, she said with a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽかり、調子に乗るな。くそっ、タイミング逸して奴隷を両親の前で辱める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Smack! Don't get cocky. Damn, I missed the timing to humiliate the slave in front of the parents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊びが出来なかったではないが、まぁ次の機会だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wasn't able to play around but, well, next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが魔法使いの杖を持っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila is holding a wizard's staff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、お前そんな杖もっていたか？いつのと違わないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, did you have such a staff? Isn't it different from before?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親から貰った杖、シィルを大切にしてくれていたおじいさんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a staff given by her parents, from her grandfather who treasured Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが二十歳になったら渡してくれと両親に渡していた物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had given it to the parents, asking them to hand it over when Sheila turned twenty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おじいさんの形見である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a memento from her grandfather.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前のおじいさん偉大な魔法使いだったそうだから、すごいのかその杖
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say your grandfather was a great wizard, so is that staff amazing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・偉大といっても、辺境の村での事なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Great or not, it was in a remote village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と一緒に世界のいろいろな場所にいく、すごい冒険をして、すごい人達と出会い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together with Lord Rance, she traveled to many places in the world, having incredible adventures and meeting amazing people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして今も世界最高ランクの装備品を頂いています、それに比べたら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, she has the world's top-ranking equipment; compared to that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中級よりちょっと上くらいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just a little above intermediate rank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、これおじさいんの宝でおじいさんにとってすごい魔法の杖で、私に譲ってくれたんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this is my grandfather's treasure; it's a great magic staff to him, and he passed it down to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、私・・いつもの杖でなくこちらを使うとちょっ力が発揮出来にくくなりますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, if I use this instead of my usual staff, my power is a bit harder to manifest...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持っていてもよいでしょうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it alright if I keep using this one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・好きにしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Do as you like.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、ＸＸＸ草原についた。（場所名は任せる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and company arrived at the XXX plains. (Name of the place is up to you)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この場所が南西部の１番の激戦区であり、ゼス炎軍、氷軍を中心とした軍団と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is the fiercest battlefield in the southwest, with the Zeth Flame Army and Ice Army as the main forces,
